casebody.data:
BRAITERMAN-FEDDER COMPANY v. MAURO V. CARDILLI. [No. 9,

January Term, 1929.]

Decided March 19th, 1929.

*700The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Ubneb, Obbutt,. Digges, Pabke, and Sloan, JJ.

Morris Fodder and W. Qonwell Smith, for the appellant.' L. B. Keene Claggett, with whom were Bartlett, Poe & Claggett on the brief, for the appellee. Sloan, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court, reversing the order.
